Open Directory Project Not Alone Anymore

17 Oct 1999

Go Guides from Go.com are a new alternative to the DMOZ.org directory. It works quite similiar as the known system from the Netscape directory. The Go Guides are volunteers who try to catalogue the net.

\nBeta tested since July - results online since September.

\n For someone who wants to become a known expert this is a good chance to polish one renommee.

Go
